Privacy Policy

Last updated: 21 November 2025

We respect your privacy. This policy describes how 10XGrowthEdge collects, uses and protects your information.

Information we collect

When you place an order we collect your name, email address, phone number, billing details and transaction information.

How we use your information

  • To process your payments and deliver digital products
  • To provide support and updates related to your purchase
  • To send important account or transaction information

Data sharing

We do not sell your personal data. We may share limited information with payment gateways and email service providers only to complete your order.

Contact

For any privacy-related questions, write to 10xgrowthedge@gmail.com.
